message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $9,500, which reflects its true value.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay $8,500 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,500 is significantly below my bottom line.  I could consider letting it go for $9,000. This is a very competitive offer considering the value it brings.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I am able to offer $8,750 for the product.
Bob, it seems like we're getting closer.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $8,875.  I believe this is a fair compromise and a very attractive price for this product.
